https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nSd7sRuLPiWYvss6MX8YLFSVwYO.jpg Doctor Carter losts his wife and devotes his life to resurrecting her. However, every test of his C-900 formula creates hungry, flesh-eating zombies. Then, his daughter Cara contracts the virus and she and her sister strive to obtain the anti-serum. Bombshell Bloodbath
